extendedInfo.description: Count/track anything (holidays, people in a plane, bills, push-ups, sleep hours, sheep...) or get iterating numbers to put on documents (invoice for instance).You can view the history of your actions and enrich it, to make a real daily log.You can also set up goals.Features: you can add as many counters as you want, lock counters, jump to new values, reset counters, filter per category, display logs, comment logs, delete logs, share counters values and logs via e-mail, export logs via CSV file, display full screen counters.Click on a counter to edit it: you can rename it, adjust step, set category or unit, set trigger value, set reset value.In full screen mode, you can use volume buttons to inc/dec, and shake to reset. If counter's unit is "minute", you can start a chronometer via menu to automatically increase/decrease counter.You can also put different widgets in homescreen.Chroco can be used as a tally counter.External storage authorization is used for the CSV file creation on the SD card when you export logs.

reviews.title: Excellent application
reviews.comment: I would like to have an option of choosing the background color of every category to make it easier to move between several categories. Thank you very much.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just what I needed!
reviews.comment: Counts multiple things at the same time and at different intervals including decimal values. Even has widgets! Nice job!
reviews.author: Ronald Edwards

reviews.title: Best counter/tally app!
reviews.comment: There really isn\'t a better counter/tally app out there (believe me, I\'ve checked out most of them). This app is easy to use, with a clean UI, and has EVERYTHING I need; multiple counters, adjustable increments, start at and add any amount, and best of all can exceed 7 digits, which you won\'t find in any others. Add to that a log you can export, plus it\'s free and ad-free. NOTE TO DEVS; please don\'t abandon this app, people would pay, it really is best in class. Thank you ;-)
reviews.author: Paul Thomas

reviews.title: Widget Useless
reviews.comment: The widget will not increment anything, it just sits there and does not respond to taps.  Widget is useless.
reviews.author: Marcus Green

reviews.title: Great for \"Quantified Self\" projects
reviews.comment: More functionality than any other clicker app. Downloadable record of every click, including time of click--for easy use in Excel. Awesome for my projects. Would be great for academic research, too. Thank you, Bliss!

reviews.comment: Really great! I love the log feature.\nCan we a have countdown mini-widget?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hands down the best of its kind.
reviews.comment: I wanted a tally program to help me keep track of several different things to help me change my habits, from the amount of time I spend in front of the TV to how many calories I eat in a day. This app can be tailored for just about anything you can think of in terms of counting. For time, you can set the units to minutes/hours/days/etc. It\'s got units for calories, distance, weight, dollars, cigarettes, laps and more. You can even define your own units. You can also define the size of the increments, for instance, I wanted to count my time spent in front of the TV 15 minutes at a time and this app does that. It also lets you define the reset value; if I wanted to limit myself to 2000 calories a day, I could set the reset value at 2000 calories and then count backwards to 0, then the next day when I hit reset on the counter, it resets back to 2000. The interface is clean, simple and elegant. You can even put a widget for each counter on your home screen. The author of this app thought of just about everything and you\'re not going to find a better app of this type. Even better, this app is free, though I would pay money for it without hesitation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrific app!

reviews.title: Perfectly Simple
reviews.comment: This is a very simple app that does exactly what I need, count. It does not require any special permissions, no extra stuff you don\'t need that make it slow or buggy, and the developer even makes some changes based on user reviews. I had only one request to make this app perfect, and they added it. Its the perfect app for a simple task.
